name: To_increase (DEMO)
description:
To_increase_demo (supplemental name) is a break-out / arcanoid game for those who like getting random powerups that can break a game for good. As it is a demo, you can only play seven levels and get four powerups. In the future (depending how the games evolves) i'm planning to add customization for the player, random selection of levels, descriptive menu for the powerups and more. I hope you like it!

W,A,S,D or Up, Down, Left, Right arrow keys to move in game and menu; R or Enter for start; J or Space Bar for A buttom.
